paper.title: Iterative nonparametric estimation of a log-optimal portfolio selection function
paper.abstract: Let stock market vectors form a stationary ergodic sequence. For fixed d is an element of N, a log-optimal portfolio selection function of the past d observed vectors is iteratively estimated on the basis of a training sequence by use of gradients and nonparametric regression. Strong consistency is obtained under a boundedness and alpha -mixing condition without further assumptions on the distribution.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是迭代非参数估计对数最优投资组合选择函数，这直接应用于投资组合管理的领域，旨在优化投资组合的选择。
